caption.p: Description of recombination transmission net found among the 165 HIV-1 variants collected in Kinshasa from 2016 to 2018.

table-wrap-foot.p: RecB, recombination network sharing 599 nts subtype B fragment in RT; RecG, recombination network sharing 615 nts subtype G fragment in IN; M, male; F, female; frag., fragment. Analysed pol fragment (numbering according to HXB2): 1, positions 2253-2934 (in protease); 2, positions 2935-3534 (in retrotranscriptase); 3, positions 3704-4389 (in RNase H); 4, positions 4390-5005 (in integrase).
